page.title: 04SHOPS IN GORDON
page.content: There are four shops in Gordon.In 1850 there were 27.(feuar,tea dealer,cooper ,milliner and fishing tackle maker) Newsagent The shop is small and packed.It has a counter.The newsagent sells sweets,toys,newspapers,groceries and dairy product. Drapers The shop is small it has a counter. It sells sewing equipment, underwear jumpers (etc). Post Office The shop is small and cramed.It sells milk,bread,crisps,fruit and groceries. Lots of people go to the post office. Grocer The shop is spacious.It sells sweets, milk,groceries and cigaretes.The shop is open nearly all week.It opens in the morning but the opening time differs.
